column4: I installed the upgrade of the xorg/xserver packages but now X does not work anymore (nvidia with restricted drivers) anyone knows if there is a solution somewhere yet?
try to add screen resolution in xorg.conf, many people got problem with this 'cause it cannot auto detect monitor resolution
I have a metamodes there cause I have 2 screens. It worked properly before the auto upgrade from yesterday.
i use this in xorg.conf to have dual display http://paste.ubuntu.com/332950/  , you should try to change the number to fit your monitor
